rules_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a card with the lowest mana value among the revealed nonland cards. You lose 2 life.
Jump-start [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“We're so close, my love. To everything.”[/i]
